snippet: The Democratic senator continues to deliver scathing criticism of the C.I.A. and the Obama administration for their responses to the Intelligence Committee’s findings.
abstract: Departing Sen Mark Udall delivers stinging attack on Senate floor against intelligence community and White House; says CIA's strong effort to rebut Senate Intelligence Committee's report on torture of terrorism suspects is proof the intelligence community has not learned from its mistakes; criticizes Pres Obama for not embracing report's findings.
lead_paragraph: The Democratic senator continues to deliver scathing criticism of the C.I.A. and the Obama administration for their responses to the Intelligence Committee’s findings.

headline.main: On Torture Report, Colorado’s Udall Leaves Subtlety at Door on the Way Out
headline.print_headline: On Torture Report, Colorado’s Udall Leaves Subtlety at Door on the Way Out

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
